Class Character

java.lang.Object
Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class Character extends Object
Class to create a character with name and gender

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(String n, String g, int currRoom)
      Constructior for the Character
      Parameters:
      n - name of the character
      g - gender of the character given as a string ("m","f","n" or "male", "female", "neutral" are the valid inputs)
      currRoom - current room of the character given as integer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the gender is not given in a valid format

    • Character

      public Character(String n, Gender g, int currRoom)
      Constructior for the character with gender as argument
      Parameters:
      n - name of the character
      g - gender of the character given as gender type
      currRoom - current room of the character given as integer

      public void setCurrentRoom(int n)
      Method to set the current room of the player
      Parameters:
      n - room in which the character should move
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the room is not in the range of 1 to 9
